title: 76ers Plan to Build $1.3 Billion Arena in Philadelphia
itunes:title: 76ers Plan to Build $1.3 Billion Arena in Philadelphia
description:
David Adelman, Founder and CEO of Darco Capital, discusses his plans to develop a new downtown arena for the NBA's Philadelphia 76ers.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
